Cartesian Sea

  • Card Variation:

    Trap

  • Play Style:

    This trap does not need to be laid before use. Play before the dial die roll. For this roll you can turn night to day, or day to night. It cannot affect a storm roll.

  • History:

    The biggest fish in the sea stretches into the time dimension. It often jumps to the next day or night to avoid being around conflict.

  • Scarcity:
    Founder's Deck
